name: Beast Strikes
description:
Small 2D adventure game based on Godzilla.

In this game you will play as Tilla, you need to reach your lair safe and sound.

This game can be played with a controller, keyboard or MobilePhone.

Game made by: @Ad0rian

GameMusic:

  • Komiku-Action Epic (Free Music)
    •  https://freemusicarchive.org/music/Komiku
  • Monplaisir-Action (Free Music) 
    • https://freemusicarchive.org/music/Monplaisir/American_Dreams_Soundtrack/Monplai...
